## SynQLite.getById() method

Retrieves a single record by it's ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getById<T>(params: TableNameRowParams): Promise<T | any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | TableNameRowParams | Object containing table/row parameters. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;T \| any&gt;


## Remarks

The column used to identify the record is according to the [SyncableTable](./synqlite-web.syncabletable.md) that was provided in [SynQLiteOptionsBase.tables](./synqlite-web.synqliteoptionsbase.tables.md) at instantiation.
